name: Upload XLS
description: A sample widget that allows users to upload a file

UploadResult.description: Holds the result of the Upload request

properties.name: errorMessage
properties.description: Error Message returned by the request

FailedRow.description: Holds the result of the Upload Test

properties.name: row
properties.description: Data that was attempted to be uploaded in JSON format

properties.name: rowAsString
properties.description: Data that was attempted to be uploaded in formatted String

downloadFailedRecords.description: downloads the failed records as an XLS file.

downloadCustomFailedRecords.description: downloads ResultSet as an Excel file.

parameters.name: failedRows
parameters.description: Array of ResultSet of failed rows

getChunkSize.description: returns chunk size used for batch processing.

getCurrentBatchStartingNumber.description: returns starting index of current batch.

getTotalRows.description: returns number of rows in the data.

parameters.name: sheetName
parameters.description: Name of sheet to retrieve data for

getUploadResult.description: Returns the array of Failed records.

parameters.name: sheetName
parameters.description: Name of sheet to retrieve data for

getSheetNames.description: Returns the array of worksheet names.

parameters.name: chunkSize
parameters.description: Maximum number of rows of data to include in each upload batch

setOAuthParameters.description: Returns the logon token using the OAuth parameters.

parameters.name: useServiceAccount
parameters.description: Boolean indicating whether to use the Service Account or SSO

setUseServiceAccount.description: Indicates whether to use the Service Account or SSO

uploadData.description: Uploads the selected File to SAC.

parameters.name: mapping
parameters.description: JSON object representing mapping of Column names in the spreadsheet to Dimension/Measure names in the model

parameters.name: defaultValues
parameters.description: JSON object representing default values for Dimensions that exist in the model but do NOT appear in the spreadsheet

parameters.name: reverseSigns
parameters.description: Set to true if your INC or AST account values are being uploaded as positive values and false if they are being uploaded as negative values

parameters.name: sheetName
parameters.description: If your Excel file has multiple sheets then use this to pass in the name of the sheet to use

parameters.name: useFiscalDate
parameters.description: Set to true if the date values are being passed as Fiscal Dates

uploadCurrencyRates.description: Uploads the selected File to an SAC Currency Rate table.

parameters.name: currencyTable
parameters.description: Name of the Currency Rate table

parameters.name: mapping
parameters.description: JSON object representing mapping of Column names in the spreadsheet to Dimension/Measure names in the model

parameters.name: defaultValues
parameters.description: JSON object representing default values for Dimensions that exist in the model but do NOT appear in the spreadsheet

parameters.name: sheetName
parameters.description: If your Excel file has multiple sheets then use this to pass in the name of the sheet to use

onFileUpload.description: Called when a file has been selected by the user.

onDataUpload.description: Called when data has been uploaded to SAC.

onCancel.description: Called when the user cancels the file upload.

onBatchUpload.description: Called when data batch is uploaded.
